Package com.stormpath.sdk.servlet.http

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Resolver<T>
    An http Resolver is able to resolve (locate) a value by inspecting a request.
    Saver<T>
    An http Saver is able to save (persist) a value for later access.
    UserAgent
    Extraordinarily simple representation of an HTTP User agent that supplies only the features needed by the default filter implementations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccountPrincipal  
    CookieResolver  
    CookieSaver  
    EmailPrincipal  
    GivenNamePrincipal  
    HrefPrincipal  
    MediaType
    A sub-class of MimeType that adds support for quality parameters as defined in the HTTP specification.
    MimeType
    Represents a MIME Type, as originally defined in RFC 2046 and subsequently used in other Internet protocols including HTTP.
    MimeType.SpecificityComparator<T extends MimeType>  
    MimeTypes
    Miscellaneous MimeType utility methods.
    StringPrincipal  
    UserAgents  
    UsernamePrincipal  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidMediaTypeException
    Exception thrown from MediaType.parseMediaType(String) in case of encountering an invalid media type specification String.
    InvalidMimeTypeException
    Exception thrown from MimeTypeUtils.parseMimeType(String) in case of encountering an invalid content type specification String.
    UnresolvedMediaTypeException
    Exception thrown from DefaultContentNegotiationResolver in case of failure to resolve a media type meeting the request's Accept header and the produces media types.
